meanings.definition: Located on or near the ocean.
meanings.sent1: The cozy beach house was oceanside, offering stunning views of the sea.
meanings.sent2: We took a relaxing walk along the oceanside boardwalk.
meanings.sent3: The seagull decided to build its nest in the oceanside tree for a change.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the diamonds scattered along the oceanside shore.
meanings.sent5: The salty breeze from the oceanside filled our lungs with freshness.

meanings.definition: A place or area situated by the ocean.
meanings.sent1: The oceanside was bustling with tourists enjoying the sunny weather.
meanings.sent2: We decided to have a picnic at the oceanside park.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream truck got stuck in the sand at the oceanside.
meanings.sent4: The oceanside was a canvas of colors as the sun set over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The sound of waves crashing against the oceanside rocks was soothing.
